sponsors.name: Artificial Agency
sponsors.description: Artificial Agency is an Edmonton-based AI startup creating a generative behavior engine that brings digital worlds to life. Their technology enables non-player characters (NPCs) and virtual agents to make real-time decisions and adapt dynamically to player actions, transforming how games feel and respond.

sponsors.name: Dura Digital
sponsors.description: Dura Digital is a technology services firm that supports organizations through digital transformation — offering solutions across AI, data, human-centered design, product engineering, and systems strategy. Their approach uses a “studio + dual-shore” model to blend local and remote capabilities.
